bannerText2: Enjoy luxury shopping at reasonable prices now at TYC!
Question1: For 1:1 inquiries, please contact us via email.
Question2: (You will receive a response within 48 hours after submission)
warningSetting: Please select the service country, language, and currency. Services may vary by country.
labelFAQ1-1: Do I need to verify my phone number to register?
contentFAQ1-1: TYC.MARKET is a global platform that requires email verification for registration.
labelFAQ1-2: I want to update my membership information.
contentFAQ1-2: After logging in with your credentials, you can modify your information through <Post and Phone Number Update> or <Additional Information> entry.
contentFAQ2-1: TYC.MARKET is a global membership platform that allows payments via TYC points, credit cards, and cash.
labelFAQ2-2: I entered the wrong amount when depositing into the virtual account.
contentFAQ2-2: For virtual account deposits, the account number and amount must match for the deposit to be confirmed. If you overpaid, underpaid, or split the payment, the deposit will not be processed. If the payment is not confirmed within 48 hours after the order, the order will be automatically canceled, so please ensure the payment is made within the deadline.
labelFAQ2-3: Is there a chance that an item goes out of stock after payment?
contentFAQ2-3: Yes, items may go out of stock after payment. This can occur if inventory is depleted or the seller runs out of stock during the purchase attempt. In such cases, the customer center will notify you via text or phone. If no notification is provided, it means the order has been successfully processed.
labelFAQ2-4: I want to check my order history/progress.
contentFAQ2-4: You can check your order status by logging in and navigating to <Login Information> – <Order History>. If the item is being shipped, you can track its progress using the tracking button. For further inquiries, please contact our customer service center for detailed assistance.
labelFAQ3-1: Only some of the items I ordered have been delivered.
contentFAQ3-1: When you order multiple items at once, they are inspected and packed for sequential delivery as soon as they arrive at the local office. Items are delivered in order of arrival within 2–14 business days.
